DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Inflammatory Mediators Surrounding Titanium Zirconium Implant Abutments
DOC.detailed_description: The aim cross-sectional study utilize paper strip-based peri-implant crevicular fluid ( PICF ) sample technique evaluate influence transmucosal abutment biomaterials either titanium zirconium oxide , situ great six month , expression specific pro-inflammatory bone-mediators . Subjects previously undergone single-tooth implant replacement therapy invite participate inform consent obtain . All participant receive clinical radiographic exam implant site sample PICF . Clinical radiographic parameter implant mobility , presence absence supragingival plaque , interproximal bone level assess . Peri-apical radiograph , utilize paralleling technique , obtain implant fixture evaluate marginal bone level compare baseline periapical radiograph make time definitive prosthesis delivery . Each participant 's implant site isolated cotton roll , light air apply site eliminate potential ambient salivary contamination PICF sample . The implant site sample 30 second four distinct site ( mesio-buccal , disto-buccal , mesio-lingual , disto-lingual ) one clinician loupe magnification . The fluid volume collect strip quantify use Periotron 8000 Instrument . Cytokine , chemokine , bone mediator quantity ( pg/30 ) determine use commercial 22-multiplexed fluorescent bead-based immunoassay . Two specific multiplex kit utilize ( Milliplex MAP Human cytokine/Chemokine Immunoassay & Milliplex MAP Human Bone Panel 1B Immunoassay ) . Biostatisticians mask implant abutment biomaterial designation ( mask `` A '' `` B '' ) data analysis . Initial bivariate analysis use Wilcoxon-Mann-Whitney ( Wilcoxon Rank Sum ) test employ assess difference distribution two group ( titanium dioxide zirconium oxide ) cytokine/bone mediator age . The approach use consider whether gender difference associate particular cytokine/bone mediator . Gender distribution two group compare use Fisher exact test . The Spearman rank correlation use assess possibility relationship age cytokine . Rank-based regression model use adjust possible effect age gender cytokine bone mediator level .
